forms.name: Pick Time
Issue Questions
Answer Back
Appt Review

flow.name: template1
flow.BPMNXML:
<definitions targetNamespace="http://www.activiti.org/test" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:activiti="http://activiti.org/bpmn" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL">
  <process isExecutable="true" name="template1" id="template1">
    <startEvent name="Start" id="startevent1"/>
    <userTask activiti:formKey="poi_Question1_FormId" activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" name="Question1" id="usertask1"/>
    <endEvent name="End" id="endevent1"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="usertask2" sourceRef="startevent1" id="flow1"/>
    <userTask activiti:formKey="poi_Question2_FormId" activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" name="Question2" id="usertask2"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="servicetask1" sourceRef="usertask2" id="flow3"/>
    <userTask activiti:formKey="poi_Answer1_FormId" activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" name="Answer1" id="usertask3"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="parallelgateway1" sourceRef="usertask1" id="flow4"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="endevent1" sourceRef="usertask3" id="flow5"/>
    <parallelGateway name="Parallel Gateway" id="parallelgateway1"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="usertask3" sourceRef="parallelgateway1" id="flow6"/>
    <userTask activiti:formKey="poi_Helper_FormId" activiti:assignee="tpanagos@point.io" name="Scheduler" id="usertask4"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="usertask4" sourceRef="parallelgateway1" id="flow7"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="endevent1" sourceRef="usertask4" id="flow8"/>
    <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="Open Time Finder" id="servicetask1">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
          <activiti:string>poi_findtimes_fact</activiti:string>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
          <activiti:expression>${listMap}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="usertask1" sourceRef="servicetask1" id="flow9"/>
  </process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagram_template1">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlane_template1" bpmnElement="template1">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_startevent1" bpmnElement="startevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="90.0" x="70.0" width="35.0" height="35.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_usertask1" bpmnElement="usertask1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="80.0" x="286.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_endevent1" bpmnElement="endevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="93.0" x="640.0" width="35.0" height="35.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_usertask2" bpmnElement="usertask2">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="80.0" x="150.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_usertask3" bpmnElement="usertask3">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="10.0" x="490.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_parallelgateway1" bpmnElement="parallelgateway1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="90.0" x="413.0" width="40.0" height="40.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_usertask4" bpmnElement="usertask4">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="150.0" x="490.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_servicetask1" bpmnElement="servicetask1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="170.0" x="220.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow1" bpmnElement="flow1">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="107.0" x="105.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="107.0" x="150.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow3" bpmnElement="flow3">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="135.0" x="202.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="170.0" x="272.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow4" bpmnElement="flow4">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="107.0" x="391.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="110.0" x="413.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow5" bpmnElement="flow5">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="65.0" x="542.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="93.0" x="657.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow6" bpmnElement="flow6">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="90.0" x="433.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="37.0" x="433.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="37.0" x="490.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow7" bpmnElement="flow7">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="130.0" x="433.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="177.0" x="432.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="177.0" x="490.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow8" bpmnElement="flow8">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="150.0" x="542.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="128.0" x="657.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow9" bpmnElement="flow9">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="170.0" x="272.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="135.0" x="338.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</definitions>
